channel.title: INfinance

item.title: My husband, 73, is giving me a life estate in his home, yet leaving his son a $200K Porsche. Is this cause for divorce?

item.title: If you take investing advice from AI, it could cost you thousands. Here’s why.

item.title: AMD’s stock is surging as these big numbers excite Wall Street
item.description: While the chip maker’s investor day left analysts with questions about its chip rollout, AMD’s big projections signaled a “clearly confident” company.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
